CustomField.description:
Volume, if Blank, will use the Tier Price as the Sales Prices for the Quantity.
Slab will calculate the Sales Price based on the all Tier Prices at and below the Quantity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Volume, if Blank, will use the Tier Price as the Sales Prices for the Quantity
Slab will calculate the Sales Price based on all Tier Prices at and below the Quantity
CustomField.label: Type
